{{Unreferenced|date=June 2009}} {{Infobox Company | company_name = CyberLink Corp. | company_logo = [[File:Cyberlink_Logo.svg|180px|Logo]] | company_type = Public ({{tse|5203}}) | foundation = | location_city = [[Taipei]] | | location_country = [[Taiwan]] | | key_people = Jau Huang, Chairman, CTO
Alice H. Chang, CEO
Shing Wong, GM, Cyberlink USA
Yuko Takase, GM, Cyberlink Japan
Johnny Tseng, VP, R&D
Manal Ma, VP, Marketing | industry = [[Computer software]]
([[Taiwan Stock Exchange Corporation|TSEC]]: Electron) | products = | revenue = $140 million | operating_income = $35.5 million | net_income = $33.0 million | num_employees = 650 | parent = | subsid = | homepage = http://www.cyberlink.com | footnotes = }} '''CyberLink''' ({{TSE|5203}}) is a digital entertainment and multimedia products software corporation. CyberLink's 2008 revenue was $140 million with market capitalization of [[USD|$]]420 million.{{Fact|date=June 2009}} Cyberlink's headquarters are based in [[Taipei]], [[Taiwan]] with worldwide offices in [[Fremont, California|Fremont]], [[United States|USA]]; [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]]; and the [[Netherlands]]. The company was founded in 1996. CyberLink products include [[PowerDVD]], [[PowerDirector]] ([[video editing software]]), [[PowerCinema]] ([[Home theater PC|Media center]] software), [[CyberLink Media Suite]] (a multimedia software suite), [[PowerProducer]] ([[DVD authoring]] software), [[CyberLink MediaShow]] ([[Image organizer]] and [[image viewer|viewer]]) and [[Power2Go]] ([[Optical disc authoring]] software). Currently, PowerCinema can be found being bundled with HP ([[HP QuickPlay]]), Acer ([[Acer Arcade]]) and Dell laptops ([[Dell MediaDirect]]). [[CyberLink DVD Suite]], [[PowerDVD]] and [[Power2Go]] may also be found on Samsung and Gateway PCs. ==Product categories== * [[DVD authoring]] and [[optical disc authoring]] software (DVDs and Blu-ray Discs) * DVD playback software * [[Video editing software]] * [[Digital home]] software * Disc and data burning software ==External links== * [http://www.cyberlink.com/ CyberLink International Site] * [http://www.consumerelectronicsnet.com/articles/viewarticle.jsp?id=31109 CyberLink's PowerCinema Powers Gigabyteâs AVPC Center] * [http://www.moovielive.com/ MoovieLive ] * [http://directorzone.cyberlink.com/ DirectorZone] [[Category:Companies established in 1996]] [[Category:Software companies of Taiwan]] [[Category:Taiwan brands]] {{Taiwan-company-stub}} {{tech-company-stub}} [[Category:Companies based in Taipei]] [[bg:Cyberlink]] [[de:CyberLink]] [[fr:CyberLink]] [[ko:ì¬ì´ë²ë§í¬]] [[it:CyberLink]] [[nl:CyberLink]] [[ja:CyberLink]] [[fi:CyberLink]] [[zh:è¨é£ç§æ]]
